name: Spaceship (FellippeHeitor)
description:
Spaceship uses ASCII characters to create an immersive space atmosphere that will serve as background for your ASCII ships while you fight ASCII enemies, eventually arriving at the source of all evil, the giant Space Amoeba that floats in space and shoots lasers.

Controllable using joysticks or keyboard.

Made with QB64.

Source code included.

Soundtrack provided by Eric Skiff: http://ericskiff.com/music/
